snippet: A coalition of left-leaning labor unions and Democratic activists who say they are not backing any one candidate had pledged over $1 million to defeat Christine C. Quinn, the front-runner.
abstract: NYC Is Not For Sale 2013, coalition of left-leaning labor unions and Democratic activists who say they are not backing any one candidate in city's mayoral race, airs first commercial against presumed front-runner, City Council Speaker Christine C Quinn; group has pledged over $1 million to defeat her.
lead_paragraph: A coalition of left-leaning labor unions and Democratic activists who say they are not backing any one candidate had pledged over $1 million to defeat Christine C. Quinn, the front-runner.

headline.seo: Outside Group Starts Spending to Block Quinn
headline.main: Outside Group Invests in Effort to Block Quinn’s Mayoral Campaign
headline.print_headline: Outside Group Invests in Effort to Block Quinn’s Campaign for Mayor
